attributes.action: ensure that families with twins or more receive Child Tax Credit for each child
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The baby element of Child Tax Credit (£545, payable while child is under 1) is only paid per pregnancy rather than per child, which means that families with twins or other multiple births miss out on a valuable monetary benefit.  We consider this to be unfair discrimination and this distinction should be abolished immediately so that these families receive a payment per child.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "ensure that families with twins or more receive Child Tax Credit for each child."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14679.asp
